scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && npx cross-env FRONTEND_URL=http://localhost:3000 npm run dev
scripts.dev:frontend: cd frontend && npx cross-env NEXT_PUBLIC_BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:4000 npm run dev
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run prisma:generate && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
